data.title: NYCMember Tour: The Met 81st Street Studio

data.meta_site_name: New York City Museum Educators Roundtable
data.text:
The Metropolitan’s 81st Street Studio opened in September of 2023 and quickly became a must visit destination for NYC families and tourists with young children. Join Heidi Holder, Frederick P. and Sandra P. Sloan Chair of Education, as she tours NYCMER members around the facility and shares some of the guiding design principles and lessons learned from the first 5 months of operation. Come prepared to channel your inner child to play where art and science meet!

Not yet a Member? Consider becoming a NYCMER member to get access to this NYCMember Tour, as well as to our full archive of resources and recordings of past programs, attend monthly professional development and networking events, purchase discounted admission to our annual conference, and more!

Annual Individual Membership – $45

Annual Student Membership – $25

Accessibility: NYCMER is committed to providing opportunities for all of our members to participate in our programs and engage with one another. This is an in-person event. Masks are encouraged though not required for attendance. Should you require any special accomodations, please contact info@nycmer.org as soon as possible.
